summary:
Motivated and skilled Software Developer with 13 years of experience and a valid Azure Developer Associate Certificate. Acquired a high proficiency across the entire software development life cycle while demonstrating expertise in a wide variety of Java EE and other technologies. Eager to learn new technologies, languages, and skills to stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices.

Strong problem-solving skills, superior communications skills and demonstrated proficiency in working both within a project team as well as in the role of an individual contributor.
headline: Senior Java Developer at jambit GmbH

experience.description:
Main responsibilities:
•	Independently developed a robust microservice responsible for managing users, showcasing proficiency in Java and Quarkus Framework.
•	Leveraged expertise in Spring Cloud Gateway to craft an efficient and secure API, optimizing communication between microservices and enhancing overall system performance.
•	Migrated the Gateway API from Java 11 to Java 17, embracing cutting-edge features and ensuring seamless compatibility with modern technology standards.
•	Implemented Kubernetes configurations for all project environments, skillfully integrating OAuth2 proxy and the Gateway API with various microservices and the user interface.
•	Authored comprehensive technical documentation, providing valuable insights into system architecture, deployment procedures, and service interaction guidelines.
•	Demonstrated a customer-centric approach by providing exemplary support to end users of the customer, ensuring a smooth adoption and operation of the developed solutions.
Additional contributions:
•	Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, addressing project requirements, and contributing to the overall success within the strict standards of an Automotive environment.
•	Proactively identified and resolved technical challenges, ensuring high-quality and reliable software deliverables.
experience.title: Senior Java Developer

experience.description:
Role description:

Worked as a Senior Java Developer for a leading company specializing in the development of a highly flexible Content Management platform with extensive functionality and numerous features.
Collaborated within multiple cross-functional teams dedicated to implementing novel functionalities and transforming the existing monolithic product into a streamlined microservices architecture.

Main responsibilities:
•	Contributed to the development of new features, offering continuous support to existing functionality, and efficiently resolving defects.
•	Played a key role in the architectural transition from monolithic to microservices, optimizing performance and scalability.
•	Established a robust CI/CD process to ensure seamless deployment of the microservices architecture.
•	Configured staging environments to showcase and test the new microservices and features.
•	Demonstrated expertise in writing unit tests (JUnit, Mockito) and integration tests, automated into a Jenkins pipeline.
•	Orchestrated the deployment configurations into Kubernetes clusters for streamlined and reliable operations.
•	Meticulously prepared technical documentation to facilitate seamless project collaboration.
•	Implemented an automated changelog generation system to enhance version tracking and transparency.
experience.title: Senior Java Developer

experience.description:
Role description:

Worked in remote team as a Senior Java Developer for the company which has developed its own Content Management platform. Participated in rewriting of monolithic product into microservies.

Main responsibilities:

- Migration of monolithic functionality into a microservice, implementing Elastic stack logging support.
- Implementing new features for existing product and bugfixing.
- Providing unit tests and documentation for implemented functionality. Regular business trips in Germany for Project Planning.

Skills: Java, Spring Boot, Maven, Git, Docker, ELK
experience.title: Senior Java Developer

experience.description:
Motivated and skilled Software Developer with 6 years experience. I've acquired a high proficiency in the entire software development life cycle while growing to an expert in a wide variety of Java EE and other technologies. 
I have strong problem solving skills, high communication skills and teamwork spirit.
